# Activity Log

- This page for certificate activities showing. Like share certificates, download etc..,

- When we need download CSV file.

<img src="../../admin/activity-log.png" />

### REST API

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Activity Log**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "paginate": {
                "offset": 0,
                "limit": 10,
                "sort": {
                    "key": false,
                    "sortKey": "",
                    "sortType": true
                },
                "search": {
                    "key": false,
                    "searchKey": "all",
                    "searchValue": ""
                },
                "institute": "all"
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: ActivityLogListRequest) {\n  getActivityLogList(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>
